result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Patrick R Kirchoff in court with attorney John Francis Manydeeds.  Defendant Patrick R Kirchoff in custody.  Roy La Barton Gay appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  court minutes filed. Charges dismissed and read in to Chippewa County Cases 15CM555, 16CM53, 16CM179 & 16CF186.

To modify no contact on defendant's bond: Granted.  The defendant may have contact with the victim while he is in jail only and may not be verbally abusive to the victim.  Victim and defendant may also not discuss pending case.
Review hearing on April 27, 2016 at 11:00 am.

No physical or verbal abuse of: anyone.   Not to possess or consume any alcohol.  Not to possess or consume any illegal drugs.  Not to possess any drug paraphernalia.  Not to go on any premises where primary purpose is the sale of alcohol.  No contact with: A.K. except as allowed by supervision.

Defendant Patrick R Kirchoff in court with attorney Kirby Daniel Harless.  Chad David Verbeten appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  court minutes filed.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for February 11, 2016 at 10:00 am.  Review hearing scheduled for March 16, 2016 at 11:00 am.
Notice of Initial Appearance and Bail for 02/23/2016 at 1:30 pm.
